title.rendered: Columbus Personal Injury and Medical Malpractice Office

content.rendered:
Columbus Personal Injury and Medical Malpractice Office

How to find our Columbus office:

Coming from John Glenn Columbus International Airport: Head south on Stelzer Road, then turn right and merge onto International Gateway. Merge onto I-670 E, then continue onto highway 270 N. Continue on highway 270 for fifteen miles, then take exit 20 to Sawmill Road. Turn left onto W Powell Road, then take another left onto Wedgewood Blvd. Our office will be on your right.

Nearby Attractions:

Columbus Zoo and Aquarium

The well-regarded Columbus Zoo and Aquarium is an interactive showcase of a wide variety of animal and marine life.

Olentangy Taverns

Family-friendly outdoor adventures including tours, mini golf, a petting zoo, and gem mining.

Indian Run Falls

Beautiful, serene waterfall and hiking trails.

Nearby Food and Drink:

The Porch Ohio

Authentic Venezuelan cuisine made with local ingredients.

Koble Grill

A self-titled fast, casual, urban restaurant. American fare made with fresh, local produce.

Swenson’s Drive-in

Classic American diner drive-thru with award-winning burgers.

Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC
9482 Wedgewood Blvd.
Suite 200
Powell, OH 43065
Telephone: 614-360-2706
Fax: 330-302-9230
Map & Directions
